data.prayer: Jesus, help the church in the state of Samut Prakan to not rely on buildings or programs, but on your Spirit and the simple faithfulness of every believer.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Samut Prakan, Thailand

data.prayer: Lord, teach the disciples in the state of Samut Prakan to trust your Word, like a lamp, in the darkness around them.
data.verse: your Word is a lamp for my feet, a light on my path.

data.section_summary: On average, 129 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who are far from God in Samut Prakan, Thailand.
data.prayer: Jesus, reveal yourself to these new families.
Spirit, guide someone in the church in the state of Samut Prakan to a person ready to receive the message of the gospel, like Lydia, and who will then open her home to faith.
data.verse: One of those listening was a woman from the city of Thyatira named Lydia, a dealer in purple cloth. She was a worshiper of God. The Lord opened her heart to respond to Paul’s message.

data.prayer: Spirit, please give new believers a yearning to see you praised in Samut Prakan, Thailand.
data.verse: Declare his glory among the nations, his marvelous deeds among all peoples.

data.prayer: Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Aheu Luang people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
God, we pray both the men and women of Samut Prakan, Thailand will find ways to meet in groups of two or three to encourage and correct one another from your Word.
Spirit, give faith and responsive hearts to the 1,041,800 citizens of the the state of Samut Prakan.
data.verse: Seek the Lord while he may be found; call upon him while he is near.

data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the state of Samut Prakan, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.
